inn1.comm: Rasel pitches on middle stump and the ball angles towards middle and leg, Tharanga moves on to the front foot and gets hit high on the front pad
fuller delivery angling into the left-hander's off stump, Tharanga leans forward and defends
good length delivery on middle stump, Tharanga pushes the ball towards mid-on
short of a length on off and middle stump, Tharanga moves across his stumps and pushes the ball past Rasel for a quick single
pitches outside off stump, seams away from Jayasuriya off the pitch and beats the outside edge of Jayasuriya's forward defence
fuller delivery closer to off stump, Jayasuriya waits in his crease and defends the ball towards cover
wayward start, Shahadat strays down leg side but the ball swung quite a bit as well
full length delivery pitches outside off and slants across the left-hander, Tharanga lets it go through to Mushfiqur
full length on off stump, Tharanga tries to drive through cover but gets a thick outside edge that runs wide of the slip cordon towards third man

dropped, Jayasuriya drives a half-volley outside off stump to Shakib Al Hasan's right at cover, he dives to his right and gets both hands to it but doesn't hold on to a tough catch, that was struck very hard, how costly will that prove?
defended off the pads on the leg side
full and wide outside the off stump, Tharanga drives the ball with an open over point to the boundary, he scattered several crows that were feeding on this outfield
Shahadat drifts on to the pads and Tharanga tries to flick, the ball brushes the thigh pad and runs past Mushfiqur, who dives to his right and tries to make the save
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
good length delivery angling into off and middle stump, Jayasuriya moves on to the back foot and defends

Rasel swings a full delivery away from Jayasuriya's off stump, he leans forward and punches the ball through covers, the outfield is on the slower side after all the rain and the ball doesn't reach the boundary
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
too full on middle and leg stump, Tharanga hardly moves his feet but lofts the ball cleanly over mid-on for four more, excellent timing and a lovely free swing of the arms
a little shorter in length on off stump, Tharanga waits for the ball to come to him and then drives in front of point for four more, Sri Lanka are picking up momentum
Shahadat tries to bounce Jayasuriya who gets into position quickly by swivelling on the back foot and pulls the ball to the square leg boundary

caught! Shahadat pitches the ball full outside off stump and angles the ball away from the left-hander, Jayasuriya tries to play the cover drive away from his body but gets an edge through to Mushfiqur who takes an easy catch, the Bangladeshis are understandably delighted
run-out missed, Sangakkara pushes the ball towards cover point and calls for a single, Aftab runs in from point and throws at the non-striker's end, Sangakkara would have been out had he hit
full and wide outside off stump, Tharanga lets the ball go
Shahadat bangs the ball in short outside off stump, Tharanga lets Mushfiqur collect it once again
short of a length outside leg stump, Tharanga tries to flick but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye behind square
defended on the back foot towards short cover
good length ball angles into Tharanga's off stump, he tries to close the face of the bat and play the ball through midwicket but mis-times the shot
Rasel thinks he has a case for lbw, the ball pitched outside off stump and angled down leg side, Tharanga moved across and was hit on the pad after he missed the flick, that was missing leg stump

lbw! The ball was nearly identical to the previous one, it pitched outside off stump and angled into the left-hander, Tharanga moved across his stumps and tried to flick, he missed and the ball thudded into the pad in front of middle , it would have clipped leg stump

the ball bounces sharply off a good length and angles across the right-hander, Kapugedera gets caught on the crease and is squared up, the ball hits the outside edge but it's too thick an edge for Mushfiqur to take while standing up to the stumps
pushed towards point for a single, Kapugedera is off the mark
good length delivery pitches outside off stump and holds its line through to Mushfiqur, Kapugedera tries to defend with his bat away from his body but gets beaten
short of a length angling into the right-hander's off stump, defended on the back foot towards cover point
Shahadat bowls the bouncer and Kapugedera ducks under it
once again Kapugedera tries to defend on the back foot with his bat away from his body, Shahadat pitches the ball on a good length, seams the ball away from the right-hander and beats the edge
fuller delivery outside the off stump, Kapugedera plays the ball with an open face towards third man
short of a length on leg and middle stump, Sangakkara plays the ball off his hips towards midwicket
good length outside Kapugedera's off stump, he defends on the back foot to point
fuller length from Rasel on middle stump, Kapugedera leans forward and drives to midwicket
a fraction short and the angle across the right-hander gives Kapugedera the room to play the cut, he hit that firmly but straight to point
Kapugedera moves forward to a fuller delivery and pushes the ball through the gap at cover point
the ball seams away from Kapugedera after pitching on a full length around off stump, he moves forward and tries to play the off drive but gets beaten
Kapugedera gets a single off the last ball courtesy an edge to third man, he tried to defend that towards cover

dropped again, what a sitter, Kapugedera pushed tentatively away from his body at a good length ball outside the off stump, the edge flew at waist height to Farhad Reza at second slip who grassed the easiest of chances, Shahadat is visibly upset
Shahadat replies with a bouncer, Kapugedera ducks under it
another short ball outside off stump, Kapugedera lets it go once again
a fraction short on off stump, Kapugedera tries to pull through midwicket but mis-times the ball towards mid-on
short of a length on off and middle stump, Kapugedera plays the ball with soft hands towards midwicket and calls for the single
Shahadat bowls the bouncer again, Rudi Koertzen gives Shahadat a warning, what's that for?
flicked off the hips towards midwicket, it's been an eventful over
Kapugedera once again drives loosely away from his body at one that seams away from him, Rasel once again beats the edge
pitches outside off stump and moves away from the right-hander, left alone by Kapugedera
Kapugedera walks down the pitch and tries to slog Rasel back over his head, the ball swung away from him and he wasn't close to hitting that

the edge flies wide of the wicketkeeper and falls short of first slip, Kapugedera pushed hard at the ball outside the off stump, the seam movement induced the outside edge, Mushfiqur dived full stretch towards his right but couldn't reach it
Kapugedera gets beaten outside the off stump once again
this is becoming a habit now, for the umpteenth time Kapugedera fishes outside the off stump and the ball once again beats the outside edge
classy cover drive, Sangakkara moves forward to a full delivery outside off stump and drives between cover and mid-off, that was superbly timed
played off his hips with soft hands towards midwicket, Sangakkara sprints for the single
too wide outside the off stump for Kapugedera to be interested in playing a shot
good length outside the off stump, Kapugedera waits in his crease and lifts his bat out of the way

full and wide outside the off stump, Kapugedera gets down on one knee and tries to drive through cover, he's beaten once again, the umpire calls the ball wide but Kapugedera hasn't looked comfortable at all
Kapugedera tries through cover once again but gets a thick outside edge that flies behind point
good length delivery pitches on leg and middle stump, Sangakkara moves on to the back foot and flicks off his hips through square leg to retain strike
good length delivery on off and middle, defended on the front foot to mid-on
good length on off stump, Sangakkara moves back and across and drives towards mid-on
the ball pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from Sangakkara who moves on to the back foot and pushes the ball towards cover
Sangakkara gets behind the line of the ball by moving back and across towards the off side and punches the ball to mid-off
good length delivery angling into off and middle stump, defended on the front foot towards midwicket
Sangakkara leans forward and defends towards midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, cut into the covers but cant beat anyone
back of a length again, this time he stands his ground and flashes a back-foot drive, missing all ends up
back of a length once again, now he gets in line and pushes it back
room offered this time but he mistimes it again, cutting into the ground and point fields with little hassle
better shot, getting forward to the pitch of a fuller delivery and driving to mid-off
and Kapugedera's sluggish innings comes to an end as he gets half-forward and  plays across the line, looking to flick a full delivery but chipping a simple chance to Mehrab Hossain jnr at mid-on
good length, he comes forward and defends
good length on off stump, Sangakkara comes forward and defends
back of a length, he gets across and pushes straight to point
back of a length, pitching outside off and moving away, Sangakkara leaves
good length outside off stump, Sangakkara watchfully leaves
strays onto leg stump and he flicks to deep backward square for two
pitches on a good length outside off stump and holds its line, Mubarak moves forward and shoulders arms
the ball pitches outside off stump and jags back sharply into Mubarak who was caught on the crease as he tried to defend, that was close but maybe a fraction too high on the pad
Mubarak tries to defend but gets an edge that bounces well short of slip
short of a length outside off, Mubarak lets it go
fuller delivery on off stump, Mubarak moves forward and pushes to mid-off for a single to get off the mark
Reza bowls a bouncer but it's too high and Koertzen calls it wide
good length outside the off stump, Sangakkara moves on to the front foot and drives to cover
good length delivery angling into Mubarak's off stump, he leans on to the front foot and blocks
pitches on a good length outside off and seams away from the left-hander, Mubarak strides forward and lets the ball go through to the wicketkeeper
again Rasel keeps it around off stump and seams away from Mubarak, he lets it go
short of a length outside off stump and this time the ball angles into Mubarak instead of seaming away, defended on the front foot
fuller length outside the off stump, Mubarak comes on to the front foot but drives to mid-off
defended on the front foot back to Rasel
punched off the back foot towards Reza

Reza drops a fraction short on middle and leg stump, Sangakkara moves towards the off side, swivels and pulls the ball toward the long-leg boundary, that brings up Sri Lanka's 50, it's taken a while and a lot of effort
played through point off the back foot for a single
Mubarak tries to play the ball through the off side but gets an inside edge past leg stump for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara gets behind the line and defends towards cover with a straight bat
pushed towards extra cover on the front foot for a sharp single to end the over
Sangakkara tries to sweep from wide outside the off stump and gets beaten
a fraction short on off and middle stump, Sangakkara moves across and pulls the ball off his hips through midwicket
full and wide outside the off stump, driven to point
Mubarak tries to drive through cover but the ball beats the outside edge
driven to long-on for one more
Sangakkara goes down on one knee and plays the paddle sweep in the air towards the vacant short fine-leg region

good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara moves across and tries to run it down to third man, he gets beaten and Mushfiqur, who is standing up to the stumps, can't collect the ball cleanly
short and wide outside off stump, Mubarak mis-times the cut to point
defended on the front foot towards cover, Mubarak wants the single but Sangakkara says no
short of a length outside off, Mubarak moves forward and across and opens the face to angle the bat to point
short and wide outside the off stump, Mubarak moves back and cuts through cover point for  a single
fuller delivery angling into Sangakkara's pads, flicked towards fine leg for a single
Sangakkara walks across his stumps and drives to midwicket

a soft dismissal, Razzak flights the ball outside off stump, Sangakkara doesn't use his feet and drives away from his body, he hits the ball with the bottom of the bat and spoons a comfortable catch to Tamim Iqbal at mid-off, Sangakkara was in good nick and he's given it away
he's off the mark right away with a sweep towards fine leg
tossed up outside the off stump, Mubarak moves forward and defends to midwicket
a bit too wide outside the off stump, Mubarak tries to cut but gets an outside edge that runs past Mushfiqur towards the third-man boundary
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Mubarak leans forward and defends back to the bowler
full length delivery angling into off stump, Dilshan moves forward and drives to mid-off
good length delivery on off and middle stump, Dilshan waits on the back foot and drives towards point
Reza strays on to middle and leg but his length is still good, Dilshan moves back and pushes the ball through midwicket
Mubarak steps down the pitch and tries to hit Reza down the ground, he gets an inside edge on to pad for a single
short of a length outside off stump, the ball cuts back into Dilshan who waits on the back foot and drives towards point inspite of the lack of room
banged in short and Mubarak takes his eyes off the ball as he tries to hook, he gets a top edge towards fine leg
driven off the front foot through midwicket
defended on the front foot towards cover
this time Dilshan plays the ball wide of the man at cover and calls for the single
played with an open face towards short third man
Mubarak gets down on one knee and tries to sweep, he gets more of a bottom edge towards fine leg
bowled flat and quick on middle and off stump, Dilshan moves back in his crease, makes room and cuts through cover point

full length delivery outside the off stump, Dilshan moves on to the front foot and places the cover drive perfectly between cover and extra cover, he's timed that well enough to beat the man on the sweeper boundary

dropped, Dilshan tried to cut a delivery that pitched outside off stump and cut back into him, he was cramped for room and got an outside edge, Mushfiqur dived towards his right with one hand but couldn't hold on, Bangladesh have been poor in the field today
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Mubarak lofts a full ball over mid-on for four, he timed that very well

another dropped chance, Mubarak tries to repeat the loft over mid-on but mis-times the shot, he ends up lofting the ball high in the air back over the bowler's head, Razzak runs towards his right at mid-on but drops another simple catch, terrible fielding
driven off the front foot through cover
cut off the back foot to short third man
bowled flat and fast into the left-hander, defended back to the bowler
Mubarak moves towards the off side and slog sweeps Razzak over midwicket, that was hit with a lot of power and in the gap as well
tossed up outside the off stump, Mubarak uses his long reach to sweep the ball from outside off towards deep backward square leg
tossed up outside the off stump, Mubarak moves forward and drives to long-on, Dilshan sprints back to the non-striker's end for the second run, that man is fast
played off the pads towards short fine leg for one more
bowled flat through the air on off stump, Mubarak moves forward and tries to drive, he gets an outside edge towards third man
flighted delivery on off and middle stump, Mubarak moves back in his crease and plays the ball to midwicket
pushed through midwicket on the front foot, the single brings up Sri Lanka's 100, they've lost four wickets in getting there and had Bangladesh held their catches, it could have been a few more
flat delivery angling into Dilshan who leans forward and paddles the ball towards fine leg
played off the pads through midwicket for one more
Dilshan leans forward and tries to sweep once again, this time he gets a top edge towards fine leg
short and wide outside the off stump, cut to deep point off the back foot
Dilshan quickly moves towards leg side to make room and drives through cover point for two more
too short outside the off stump from Mahmudullah, Dilshan backs away and cuts hard to the fielder in the deep
far too short once again, Mubarak waits for the ball to come to him and pushes it into the gap at cover
fuller and closer to off stump, Dilshan plays the ball with soft hands towards cover for one more
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
flighted delivery on off stump, Dilshan gets down on one knee and paddles the ball behind square leg for a single to bring up the 50 partnership
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Mubarak uses his feet, comes down the track and drives wide of the fielder at mid-on
Dilshan sweeps towards long-leg once again, he's picking off the ones and twos with ease
defended to midwicket on the front foot
Mubarak tries to sweep this time but can't beat the fielder at short fine leg
dropped short and wide outside the off stump, Dilshan moves on to the back foot and cuts through cover
quick delivery angling into middle stump, flicked off the pads to midwicket
swept towards deep backward square leg for one more
pitches outside off stump and spins into Dilshan who backs away towards leg side and defends
driven off the back foot through covers, he's placed that well in the gap, the fielder has to run a long way to his right and dives to save the boundary
Mubarak tries to sweep but doesn't make contact
tossed up outside the off stump, Dilshan drives firmly off the back foot through covers
full ball on middle stump, defended towards midwicket
played off the pads uppishly towards midwicket
Mubarak drives to long-on for one more, he uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball
cut through covers off the back foot for another single
bowled quick and flat on middle stump, defended towards point on the front foot
played off the back foot to long off for a single
tossed up outside the off stump, Mubarak gets down on one knee and sweeps towards short fine leg
Dilshan leans forward to a full delivery and drives hard through covers, he ccalls Mubarak through for two when most batsmen would have settled for one
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
cut hard off the back foot to the fielder on the cover fence, two more
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Dilshan tries to drive but gets an edge to short third man
Mubarak moves across his stumps and sweeps to short fine leg
Mubarak steps down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and with a full swing of his long arms, lofts the ball in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
played off the pads towards short fine leg for a quick single
Dilshan moves towards the off side and paddles the ball behind square on the leg side
full ball angling into off and middle, Mubarak leans forward and flicks behind square leg
full ball outside off stump, Dilshan backs away towards leg and drives through cover point for a single to end the over
pitches on off stump and spins into Dilshan who backs away to make room and drivs to cover
Dilshan gets down on one knee and slog sweeps from off stump over midwicket, the ball bounces just inside the boundary, that was hit right out of the middle of the bat

bowled him, and how? Dilshan tries to play a cheeky reverse pull to a quick delivery on off stump, he didn't have the room, missed completely, and the ball crashed into off stump, Mahmudullah picks up his maiden ODI wicket
he gets off the mark straightaway by moving across his stumps and flicking through square leg
flighted delivery drifts into Mubarak's blockhole, dug out back towards the bowler
defended on the front foot towards cover
driven off the front foot towards long-off for a single
Mubarak sweeps from outside off stump through square leg
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
full delivery outside off stump, driven on the front foot through cover
Mubarak leans forward and closes the face of the bat to flick the ball to midwicket
Jayawardene pushes forward at one that stops on him outside the off stump, he gets an outside edge towards short third man
bowled flat outside the off stump, Mubarak moves toward the off side and lofts the ball towards long-on
pitches on a good length on middle stump and bounces sharply on Jayawardene who defends on the back foot
Jayawardene makes room by moving towards leg side and chips the ball inside out over extra cover
Razzak drifts down leg side, Jayawardene moves towards the off and sweeps to the fine-leg boundary, perfectly executed
Jayawardene moves towards the leg side this time and delicately late cuts a flat delivery from off stump to the third-man boundary
pushed towards midwicket on the front foot for a single, 12 runs off the over
Jayawardene moves forward and drives through cover for a single
Mubarak drives a full and flat delivery to long-on
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and drives through cover
Mubarak comes forward and gently drives a full delivery to long on to move on to 48
Jayawardene moves across his stumps and plays the paddle sweep past Mushfiqur, that's played very fine and he'll get three for it
Mubarak moves on to the back foot and drives past midwicket, Mubarak reaches his half-century with that quick double, it's his third ODI fifty, well played
short and wide outside off, Jayawardene backs away and cuts to point, he'll feel that he missed out
cut to point for a quick single this time, Jayawardene was in danger at the bowler's end and a direct hit would have dismissed him
Mubarak tries to cut and gets beaten
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
cut off the back foot to deep point for two more
flighted delivery outside the off stump, driven to long-off on the front foot

Shakib bowls a flat delivery down leg side, Mubarak stretches forward and tries to sweep, he misses the shot and Mushfiqur quickly whips off the bails, it's a very close call and replays show that Mubarak's foot was just back over the line
full delivery on off and middle stump, Mubarak sweeps to deep square leg on the front foot

finally they've caught one, Jayawardene tries to play the slog-sweep to deep midwicket from outside off stump, he gets a top-edge that goes high in the air, Mushfiqur runs towards midwicket and safely takes the catch
flicked off the pads to deep square leg
bowled quickly through the air on middle stump, Maharoof leans forward and defends
driven on the front foot to cover
Maharoof waits for the ball to come on to the bat on off stump before opening the face to guide it to short third man
poor delivery, a long hop pn off and middle stump, Mubarak waits on the back foot and pulls powerfully into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
defended on the front foot to the off side
driven to mid-off on the front foot for  a single
Maharoof goes on to the back foot and pushes the ball off his pads through square leg
flicked off the pads through square leg

that's plumb, Razzak tosses the ball up on middle stump, it goes straight through after pitching, Maharoof tries to sweep and misses, he gets hit on the back foot in front of middle stump, simple decision for Asoka de Silva to make
Mubarak makes room by moving towards the leg side and lofts inside out over extra cover for four, lovely timings and placement
flicked off the pads through midwicket, Chandana calls Mubarak through for two runs
flatter delivery on off stump, pushed towards point on the back foot
Chandana goes back in his crease and tries to flick through midwicket, he gets a leading edge towards cover
defended to point on the back foot
Mubarak comes down the track but isn't to the pitch of the ball, he pushes the ball gently through cover for  a single
driven to long-on off the back foot for one more
Mubarak plays the reverse sweep, well more of a reverse paddle actually and runs the ball fine past the wicketkeeper
tossed up outside the off stump, Chandana cuts firmly to short third man

what a catch! Tamim takes a blinder on the boundary, Chandana lofts a full delivery on middle and leg stump towards long-on, Tamim is a fair distance inside the boundary, he runs back and once he realises the ball his flying over his head, he leaps backwards and catches the ball with one hand while at full stretch, outstanding catch, and after all the sitters Bangladesh have dropped today
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

Kulasekera tries to flick but misses, the ball hits the pad and Mubarak calls him through for a leg bye, Razzak sprints toward the ball, picks up and under-arms it back at the batsman's end, he hits the stumps with a direct hit and Mubarak is well short of his crease
fired quick and flat down leg side, wide called
defended on teh front foot back to the bowler
Fernando tries to sweep across the line of the ball but gets hit on the pad outside off stump, they run three leg byes to third man
Kulasekara lofts Razzak down the ground to long-off for a single
bowled him! Fernando tried to slog across the line, Razzak bowled it fast and straight and pegged middle stump back, Sri Lanka have been dismissed for 196

inn2.comm: pitches short of a length outside the off stump, Omar moves forward and lets the ball go through to Sangakkara
fuller length but the line is still outside off stump, Omar shoulders arms once again
pitches outside off and cuts back into Omar who gets caught on the crease and defends awkwardly to the leg side

caught! Maharoof hits a good length around the off stump and seams the ball away from Omar off the pitch, Omar pushes away from his body on the back foot and edges the ball to Jayawardene at second slip who takes the catch at shoulder height
Maharoof strays down leg side and Sangakkara moves quickly to his left and dives to catch a ball that was swinging away from him
good length delivery outside the off stump, Mushfiqur lets the ball go
Maharoof once again pitches outside leg stump and strays further down leg side, Sangakkara has more work to do
that's the third wide down leg side, a mixed start for Maharoof, a wicket and three wides
short of a length on off and middle stump, Mushfiqur gets behind the line and defends towards midwicket
starts off with a sharp bouncer on off stump, Tamim sways out of the way
pitches just short of a length on middle and off stump and seams away from Tamim who gets squared up by the bounce, the ball beats the bat
Fernando strays down leg side this time, the slower ball gone wrong, Sangakkara dives at full stretch and saves four wides
good length delivery on middle and off stump, Tamim moves on to the back foot and defends towards cover point
the length is fuller but the line is exactly the same, on middle and off stump slanting across the left-hander, Tamim leans forward and defends
another one flies down leg side, this time the ball beats Sangakkara's full-stretch dive and bounces over his head for five wides

Fernando goes wide of the crease and bowls a good length delivery that cuts back into the left-hander, Tamim plays back and gets hit on the top of the pad, the angle of the ball was taking it past leg stump
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Maharoof bowls another one down leg side, Sangakkara is being kept very busy
pitches outside the off stump and cuts back sharply into the right-hander, Mushfiqur shouldrs arms
this one seams away from Mushfiqur after pitching outside the off stump, he lets it go once again
we're back to the wides down leg side, all the runs have come thanks to wides so far, none off the bat

caught! Maharoof pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams the ball away from the right-hander, Mushfiqur drives loosely away from his body and gets an edge to Sangakkara who takes an easy catch, Bangladesh have made a terrible start
back of a length outside off stump, Ashraful shoulders arms
there are the first runs off the bat, Ashraful walking across the stumps and tapping a fullish delivery in front of square leg, calling immediately for the single
good length on leg stump, comes in as Tamim gets up and taps it down
short delivery well outside off, pitches and moves away, and thats another wide
shot! Fernando pitches short again and Ashraful pulls well over midwicket but the ball drops in the outfield and just stops
good ball! Nasty lifter, 90mph, pitching and fairly kicking up off outside off stump, sucking Ashraful up in the air and he does well to get bat out of the way
another short delivery, left alone this time with ease
good length, pitches and goes away as Ashraful leaves it be
fuller this time, he gets forward and defends to cover
good length on middle and off, defended back to Fernando

shot of a length, he gets back and thumps a hard drive to Chandana at point, who fields it well but tosses it to Dilshan at backward point, who doesnt see it coming and the batsmen cash in on that for one
short ball down leg stump, another wayward delivery goes wide and Ashraful calls for one
short of a length again, outside off stump, he gets back and drives well through point for a single
good length outside off stump, he leaves off the front foot
bounced in down leg stump, Ashraful hooks around the corner and picks it well wide of short fine leg, the ball bounces just inside the ropes and scatters a flock of birds
overpitched outside off stump, Ashraful plants the front foot forward and drives excellently but manages to pick the fielder at cover
back of a length, he waits on it and opens the face of the bat, steering it through gully and down to third man
short of a length on off and middle stump, Ashraful moves across his stumps and flicks to square leg off the back foot
Fernando tries to bowl the slower ball but ends up bowling a full toss on off stump, Ashraful comes forward and drives back to the bowler
too full on the pads, Ashraful leans across his stumps and flicks to deep backward square leg for two more
Fernando tests Ashraful with the short ball, he quickly gets into position and pulls towards deep square leg, the ball slows up after pitching in the outfield and the batsmen run three
Ashraful gets squared up by the bounce and the outside edge falls just short of Tharanga at gully
Fernando ends the over with the bouncer, Ashraful ducks under it
here we go! Tamim dances down the track, swings across the line to a short delivery, and misses it completely
short of a length, he gets back and cracks that between cover and point, thats a much better way to play!
back of a length on leg stump, he gets up and plays it back
and again! Tamim steps outside leg stump and moves down, the ball is short and he's not to the pitch, ends up backing away further and pulling out of the shot
thats maximum! Tamim stands his ground this time and picks up one down leg stump, hitting with the pace and the ball sails over a diving fine leg fielder
back of a length outside off stump, he gets up and defends
slower delivery outside off stump, pitches and sits up sharply, and Ashraful, playing forward and away from the body, pushes it in the air to point but it drops safely before the fielder
good length on off stump, he defends it back to Fernando
good length outside off stump, pushed at with soft hands and he picks up a single through gully down to third man
full on leg stump, nicely turned by Tamim into the gap at midwicket out to Kulasekara in the deep, for a couple
heave ho! Tamim goes through his ritual, dancing down wildly and heaving at a short delivery on middle and leg, misses it all ends up and Fernando has words of advice for him
the response is a wayward bouncer down leg stump, forcing Tamim down and the ball sails over him, Sangakkara dives and collects it but he's not pleased with the effort from Fernando
now he overcompensates by pitching full outside leg stump and Tamim flicks it through the gap at midwicket
slower delivery at 110 kmh, full and angling into off stump, Ashraful spots it early and defends on the front foot
another slower ball bowled on a good length outside off stump, Ashraful moves on to the back foot and defends
good length delivery on off stump, another slower one, defended on the front foot
back to normal speed, 133 kmh, Ashraful gets behind the line and defends

Maharoof bowls another slower one but this time it's over-pitched outside the off stump, Ashraful gets on to the front foot, waits for the ball to come to him, and drives through extra cover for four, that brings up Bangladesh's 50
chopped down to third man on the back foot for a single
pitches on a good length around off stump and cut back sharply into Ashraful who was beaten as he tried to run it down to third man
once again Ashraful tries to late cut it to third man and once again Kulasekera beats him with the bounce and seam movement into the right-hander
this time Ashraful leans forward and shoulders arms, letting the ball go through to Sangakkara
full length angling into the off stump, defended back to the bowler on the front foot
this time Kulasekera pitches the ball wider outside the off stump and Ashraful does manage to play it late down to third man
pitches outside leg stump to the left-hander and angles across Tamim who tries to defend but gets hit on the pad
pitches on a good length just outside off stump and cuts back into the right-hander, Ashraful defends on the off side
defended towards midwicket on the back foot
Maharoof pitches on a good length but strays marginally on to middle and leg stump, Ashraful quickly moves towards the off side and pulls to deep backward square leg
Tamim doesn't move his feet and tries to drive on the up to cover, he doesn't time it well
bowled short of a length on middle stump, Tamim jumps on to the back foot and defends
Maharoof pitches outside leg stump, Tamim moves back in his crease and tries to flick but doesn't make contact
good length delivery angling into the right hander, Ashraful moves on to the back foot and defends towards the off side
fuller delivery on off stump, Ashraful chooses to play it off the back foot and defend towards the bowler
tight line and length around the off stump, defended on the back foot once again

lbw! Kulasekera pitches the ball outside off stump and angles it into Ashraful who moves across his stumps and tries to flick through midwicket, he gets hit on the pad in front of middle and leg but the angle might have taken the ball past leg stump, Rudi Koertzen didn't think so though
defended towards the off side on the front foot
Kulasekera bowls it full and angles across the left-hander, Shakib leans forward and gets an inside edge on to the pad

Fernando bowls the slower delivery full outside off stump, Tamim spots the change in pace and lofts over mid-off with his feet stationary, he's timed that superbly and the ball falls a few feet inside the boundary before rolling over
flicked off the pads behind square leg
Fernando lets the ball slip wide outside the off stump, it was a full toss as well, Asoka de Silva calls it wide
banged in short of a length on middle stump, it rises sharply on Shakib who jumps on to the back foot and gets hit on the thigh
136 kmh, pitches on leg stump and the length is a little too full, Shakib leans across and flicks the ball towards fine leg where Maharoof does the fielding
Fernando tests Shakib with the bouncer just outside the off stump, he leans out of the way of the ball
good length delivery bowled at 86 mph outside off stump, Shakib waits on the back foot and defends towards cover
a fraction short and wide outside off stump, Tamim leans forward and drives through cover with a full flourish of the bat, Tharanga moves to his right and saves the boundary
Shakib gets caught on the crease and pokes away from his body, the ball beats the outside edge
defended on the back foot towards the off side
good length delivery pitches on middle stump and angles across Shakib who moves on to the back foot and defends
defended on the back foot towards cover, Kulasekera is pinning Shakib in his crease with his length
once again Shakib moves back in his crease and drives to cover, he hit that right out of the middle of the bat
full delivery angling into middle stump from round the wicket, pushed towards mid-on for a single
Fernando bowls a bouncer on middle and off stump, Shakib sways out of the way

caught! Fernando pitches the ball short of a length around off stump and angles it across the left hander, Shakib gets caught on the crease and fends away from his body, he gets a faint outside edge through to Sangakkara who takes another comfortable catch at chest height
bowled short and wide outside the off stump, the ball seams away from Aftab off the pitch and he lets it go through to Sangakkara
defended on the back foot towards Fernando
Fernando bowls another bouncer and it's directed at Aftab's head, he just about gets under it
fuller length angling into middle stump, Aftab flicks the ball off his pads to deep backward square leg
good length delivery outside the off stump, Aftab opens the face of the bat and guides the ball towards third man
Tamim drives off the front foot at a good length delivery angling across him, he gets an outside edge that beats the fielder at gully and runs down to third man
Aftab leans across his stumps and tries to flick to square leg, he gets hit on the pad and they run a leg bye
Kulasekera bowls one short but it's too short to test the batsman, Tamim ducks under it easily
played to backward point with an open face off the back foot
lovely delivery, Kulasekera draws Tamim forward with a good-length ball and beats the outside edge of Tamim's cover drive by seaming the ball away from the left-hander off the pitch
tossed up on off stump, Aftab leans forward and drives towards cover

flighted delivery on middle stump, Aftab leans forward and chips the ball to short midwicket, he sets off for the single but Tamim, seeing Chandana scamper towards the ball, sends Aftab back, Chandana did not pick up the ball or else Aftab would have been in trouble
driven through covers on the front foot
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
flighted delivery drifts across the left-hander, Tamim leans into the cover drive but gets beaten
driven to mid-on off the front foot, just one run off Chandana's first over
short of a length delivery angling into Aftab's off stump, Aftab leans forward and drives on the up to cover

Sangakkara takes a blinder! Kulasekara bowls a short ball at Aftab who tries to hook but ends up getting a glove on to it, Sangakkara moves quickly towards his left and leaps backwards to take the catch with one hand
good length delivery outside the off stump, left alone by the batsman
Kulasekera is bowling a tight line and length outside the off stump, Mahmudullah lets the ball go through to Sangakkara
defended on the front foot with an open face towards point
Kulasekara finishes a wicket maiden with a good length delivery on off stump that Mahmudullah defends towards point off the back foot
driven back to Chandana off the front foot
flicked off the pads behind square leg
lots of turn for Chandana, that pitches on off stump and turns sharply away from Mahmudullah who stands rooted to his crease and tries to defend
defended towards cover point on the back foot
Tamim leans forward and closes the face of the bat to play the ball towards midwicket
played with soft hands towards cover point for a quick single, the overthrow allows the second run
Mahmudullah attempts to pull Kulasekara and top-edges the ball towards fine leg, Sanath Jayasuriya comes running in from the boundary but the ball falls well short of him
full length delivery on off stump, pushed towards cover on the front foot
flicked off the pads through midwicket for two more
short of a length on leg and middle stump, Tamim neither plays forward nor back and tries to flick, the ball hits him high on the pad
Tamim pushes forward in defence and gets an inside edge through square leg for a single
Kulasekara tempts Mahmudullah with another short one outside the off stump, this time Mahmudullah lets it go through to Sangakkara
good length outside the off stump, Mahmudullah lets it go again
tossed up on middle stump, Tamim leans on to the front foot and blocks
Tamim gets down on one knee and sweeps from off stump to fine leg, he hit that with the turn
Chandana drags it short and wide outside off stump, Mahmudullah waits on the back foot and drives past point
Tamim lunges forward and plays the ball through square leg and calls for the single, he begins to limp mid-way through the run
defended to point on the back foot
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
tossed up, he gets forward and drives loosely, mistiming it to mid-on for one
tossed up generously, he plays across the line and paddles it around the corner for a couple, nicely done
tossed up on leg, spins down and he tucks it to square leg
tossed up again, he waits for it and works it from leg stump away for one
width outside off stump, he steers it to backward point
tossed up wide again, he waits and cracks it past point out to the deep
floated up on off stump, defended back
flatter delivery on off stump, he gets forward and taps it back
tossed up just outside off stump, he sweeps with a good stride forward but misses, Chandana goes up for leg before, Sangakkara for the catch, but Asoka de Silva isnt convinced by either
tossed up wider, he reaches for it and drives into the covers
tossed up on middle and leg, worked straight to midwicket
tossed up wider, he gets forward and steers it wide of slip
tossed up on middle and off, he shuffles and works it to square leg for one
flatter trajectory, Tamim goes back and drives through the covers for two
tossed up, he reaches for it and pushes to point
tossed up on middle and leg, he plays out in front of his pad, working it straight to midwicket
flatter down leg stump, he mistimes his attempted flick
pushed wide of off stump and Tamim plays it to backward point for a quick single
tossed up on off stump, Tamim leans forward and drives to long-off
played off the pads through midwicket
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Tamim gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep backward square leg
defended on the front foot towards the off side
played through midwicket for  asingle to end the over
flicked off the pads through square leg for one more
flighted delivery on middle stump, driven back to Dilshan
tossed up outside the off stump, Tamim comes forward and drives through cover
that spun sharply into the right-hander and beat the forward defence, Sangakkara was also beaten by the turn and the ball runs towards fine leg for byes
played through point for a single, a sloppy throw and poor wicketkeeping results in overthrows
defended on the front foot
driven on the front foot to long on for two more, Tamim moves on to 48
bowled quickly through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
Tamim moves on to the back foot and plays the ball off his pads to midwicket
full toss driven to long-on for one more
tossed up outside the off stump, the ball spins away from Mahmudullah who tries to cut off the back foot but gets beaten
full delivery on middle stump, Mahmudullah leans forward and flicks through square leg
flighted delivery on off stump, Mahmudullah strides forward and drives back to the bowler
played off the pads through square leg
Tamim waits on the back foot and drives through covers to bring up his 50, off 68 balls, it's only his second ODI fifty after the one against India in the World Cup, well played
driven to long-on off the front foot
defended towards point on the back foot, the asking-rate has touched seven an over
Tamim tried to sweep but got a top edge that went down to third man
Mahmudullah skips down the track and drives Chandana to long-on for a single, he's batted positively on his debut
Tamim leans forward and tries to flick one off his pads, the ball pitches on middle and spins way down leg side and beats everyone
flighted delivery on off and middle stump, Mahmudullah drives through midwicket on the front foot
Chandana flights one on leg and middle stump, Mahmudullah leans forward and plays the paddle reverse sweep to point
pushed on the front foot with soft hands towards cover point for  a quick single
full toss on off and middle stump, Tamim leans across and flicks the ball to deep square leg
Mahmudullah backs away to make room and chips the ball down to long off
good-length ball angling into the right-hander from over the wicket, Mahmudullah flicks off his pads through square leg
fuller length on leg and middle stump, Tamim leans across and sends the ball behind square leg with a wristy flick
full and wide outside off stump, Mahmudullah waits in his crease and square drives to point
Mahmudullah charges down the track and tries to hit Maharoof over the top, Maharoof ses him coming and bowls short and wide and beats the bat
full ball on the pads, Mahmudullah flicks past Sangakkara towards fine leg where Jayasuriya picks up the ball
cut down to third man off the back foot
tossed up on middle stump and that turns sharply across the right-hander, Mahmudullah tries to defend but gets beaten
bowled quick and flat into middle stump, played off the pads behind square

he's holed out! Tamim charges down the track and tries to smash Jayasuriya over midwicket, he didn't get to the pitch of the ball and lofted a simple catch to Kapugedera who was at deep midwicket, Jayawardene's bowling change has paid off
he's off the mark by pushing one off his pads to midwicket
defended off the front foot towards point for another quick single
short of a length outside off stump, cut off the back foot to point
short of a length angling into Mahmudullah who defends towards midwicket, Farhad responds to Mahmudullah's call but the batsman decide against the single in the end
defended on the front foot towards midwicket
Mahmudullah makes room by backing away towards leg side and lofts inside out over extra cover
full toss on off stump, defended back to Maharoof on the front foot
Mahmudullah gives Maharoof the charge and the ball is banged in short, Mahmudullah re-adjusts and manages to pull the ball to long leg
Maharoof ends his spell with a yorker outside off stump, Reza squeezes it out towards backward point for a single
played with soft hands towards midwicket for a quick single, Dilshan swoops in from cover, misses the stumps with the throw and concedes more runs
flicked through midwicket off the front foot
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
now how do you describe that? Mahmudullah gets into a front-on stance and plays a scoop shot over Sangakkara's head
lofted down to long-off for a single, the ball fell short of the fielder in the deep
bowled him! Reza gives Jayasuriya the charge and ends up yorking himself, the ball beats the bat and hits leg stump, Jayasuriya bowled that flat and fast on leg stump, he has two in two overs
full ball on off stump, lofted over the covers on the front foot
short of a length on middle and off stump, Razzak pushes the ball hard into the ground, it bounces over Kulasekara's head and the batsmen run a single
excellent improvisation, Mahmudullah moves towards the off side and chips a full-length delivery, more of a scoop actually, over the head of short fine leg
played off the pads towards Jayasuriya at short fine leg
slower ball outside the off stump, Mahmudullah waits for the ball to come to him and opens the face of the bat to play it to third man
Kulasekara finishes the over with a yorker on middle and off stump, Razzak digs it out towards mid-on for a single
cut off the back foot to backward point for a quick single
Jayasuriya tosses it up slowly outside off stump, Mahmudullah waits for it, cuts it late and gets beaten

Mahmudullah decides that he needs to find the boundary and so he charges Jayasuriya and lofts him high back over his head, Fernando runs towards the ball from long-on and Chandana sprints towards the catch from long-off, Chandana gets there quicker and tumbles to take a superb catch

Chandana takes the catch again! Razzak tries to hit Jayasuriya for six this time and ends of lofting a comfortable catch to Chandana at long-on, he didn't have to run or dive this time, it came straight to him
bowled full and fast on off stump, defended on the off side
played through midwicket for a single to end the over

he begins with a high full toss that is defended back to him by Shahadat, that was over waist height and Rudi Koertzen gives Fernando a warning, another high full toss and he will be taken out of the attack
fuller ball on middle stump, pushed through midwickt for  a single
full and wide outside off stump, Rasel has a wild swing at the ball and gets beaten
Fernando is searching for the yorker but gets the line a little wide outside off, Rasel jabs down at it and plays the ball to point
Fernando bowls a nasty short ball that lifts sharply from a short of a length, Rasel is caught off guard and gets hit on the glove
Rasel pushes forward tentatively to a good length delivery and gets an outside edge to third man
bowled full and fast at 86 mph on middle stump, Shahadat backs away and somehow keeps the ball from hitting his stumps
defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Rasel goes back in his crease and plays the ball to midwicket
pushed on the front foot through covers
Rasel leans forward and drives through extra cover
Shahadat moves on to the front foot and defends to point
Jayasuriya angles the ball into the right-hander from over the wicket, Shahadat backs away to make room and drives the ball from middle stump to long-on
bowled! That's the end of the series, Fernando fires in a yorker that's just too quick for Shahadat, he tries his best to defend but the ball gets past the bat and rattles off and middle stump
